Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; two faded added white bands; below, lotus flower in white outline with added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: dot and billet band in between lines below rim; below, band between lines.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1971) (phase 2)
